original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
translated: the Brahmakāyika gods exist,

original: tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /
analyzed: tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /
translated: the Brahmapurohita gods exist, the Brahmapārṣadya gods exist, the Mahābrahma gods exist, the Ābhāsvara gods exist, the Parīttābha gods exist, the Apramāṇābha gods exist, the Ābhāsvara gods exist,

original: dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang; mi che ba'i lha rnams dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang; mi che ba'i lha rnams dang /
translated: the Śubhakṛtsna gods exist, the Parīttaśubha gods exist, the Apramāṇaśubha gods exist, the Śubhakṛtsna gods exist, the Bṛhatphala gods exist, the Parīttābha gods exist, the Apramāṇābha gods exist, the Śubhakṛtsna gods exist, the Avṛha gods exist,

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
translated: the Atapa gods exist, the Sudarśana gods exist, the Sudṛśa gods exist, and the Akaniṣṭha gods exist.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite space, the gods of the sphere of infinite consciousness, the gods of the sphere of nothingness, and the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception exist;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @66b chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @66b chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin no //
translated: the stream-enterers, the once-returners, the non-returners, the arhats, the pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, and the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas exist in the world.”🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de lta lags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sbyin pa yongs su sbyong ba lags sam /
analyzed: de lta lags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sbyin pa yongs su sbyong ba lags sam /
translated: if that is so, then the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are purifying generosity?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sbyin pa rnam grangs kyis yongs su sbyong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sbyin pa rnam grangs kyis yongs su sbyong ste /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings purify generosity by means of synonyms.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni sbyin pa kun kyang shin tu dag pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni sbyin pa kun kyang shin tu dag pa ste /
translated: For bodhisattva great beings, all generosity is utterly pure.

original: de yang 'di ltar /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar /
translated: And that is as follows:

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
translated: bodhisattva great beings give gifts.

original: ci'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhe na /
translated: What kind of gifts do they give?

original: dge ba'i chos du ma'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos du ma'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
translated: They give the gift of many virtuous dharmas.

original: de 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: de 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
translated: In this way, they give the ten virtuous actions, the five precepts, the eight-branched poṣadha, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
translated: the five higher knowledges, the six superknowledges, the perfections, all the emptinesses, the four establishments in mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad @67a *//
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad @67a *//
translated: the five faculties, the five powers, the seven parts of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the eight liberations,

original: dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: He gives the gift of the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyis na brtson zhes bgyi ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyis na brtson zhes bgyi ba lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom practice it so that they are said to be practicing?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: here bodhisattva great beings practicing the emptiness of form are said to be practicing.

original: tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o /
analyzed: tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o /
translated: Practicing the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, they are said to be practicing.

original: mig stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mig stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of the eye, one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: rna ba stong pa nyid dang / sna stong pa nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / yid stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba stong pa nyid dang / sna stong pa nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / yid stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind, one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of form, one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: sgra stong pa nyid dang / dri stong pa nyid dang / ro stong pa nyid dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / chos stong pa nyid la brtson na @67b brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sgra stong pa nyid dang / dri stong pa nyid dang / ro stong pa nyid dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / chos stong pa nyid la brtson na @67b brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental phenomena, one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: mig gi khams stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi khams stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of the eye constituent, form constituent, and eye consciousness constituent, one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: rna ba'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sgra'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sna'i khams stong pa nyid dang / dri'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sgra'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sna'i khams stong pa nyid dang / dri'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
translated: “They are diligent if they are diligent in the emptiness of the eye element, the emptiness of the form element, and the emptiness of the eye consciousness element;🔽in the emptiness of the ear element, the emptiness of the sound element, and the emptiness of the ear consciousness element;🔽in the emptiness of the nose element, the emptiness of the smell element, and the emptiness of the nose consciousness element;🔽in the emptiness of the tongue element, the emptiness of the taste element, and the emptiness of the tongue consciousness element;

original: lce'i khams stong pa nyid dang / ro'i khams stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / reg bya'i khams stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: lce'i khams stong pa nyid dang / ro'i khams stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / reg bya'i khams stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
translated: in the emptiness of the body element, the emptiness of the touch element, and the emptiness of the body consciousness element;

original: yid kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi khams stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: in the emptiness of the thinking-mind element, the emptiness of the entity element, and the emptiness of the thinking-mind consciousness element.

original: sdug bsngal stong pa nyid dang / kun 'byung ba stong pa nyid dang / 'gog pa stong pa nyid dang / lam stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal stong pa nyid dang / kun 'byung ba stong pa nyid dang / 'gog pa stong pa nyid dang / lam stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of suffering, the emptiness of the origin of suffering, the emptiness of the cessation of suffering, and the emptiness of the path, then one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: ma rig pa stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of ignorance, then one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of volitional formations, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving,

original: len pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / rga shi stong pa nyid la @68a *//🔽brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: len pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / rga shi stong pa nyid la @68a *// brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: grasping, existence, birth, and old age and death, then one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: If one exerts oneself in the emptiness of all phenomena, then one is said to be exerting oneself.

original: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ji snyed ming gdags su yod pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ji snyed ming gdags su yod pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: Whatever conditioned or unconditioned dharmas there are that can be designated by names, if one strives in emptiness, one is said to strive.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya ste /
translated: if they strive in the emptiness of intrinsic nature, they are said to strive.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: if they strive in these seven kinds of emptiness, they are said to strive.

original: de stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed kyang brtson zhe'am mi brtson zhes mi brjod de /
analyzed: de stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed kyang brtson zhe'am mi brtson zhes mi brjod de /
translated: Although they strive in the perfection of wisdom through these seven kinds of emptiness, they are not said to strive or not to strive.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des gzugs brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gzugs brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, he does not see form as either striving or not striving.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa brtson zhe'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa brtson zhe'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as either striving or not striving.

original: gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see form as a dharma that arises or a dharma that ceases.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽gzugs kun @68b nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs kun @68b nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam /
translated: He does not see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as dharmas that arise or dharmas that cease.

original: rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see form as a dharma that is afflicted or a dharma that is purified.🔽He does not see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as dharmas that are afflicted or dharmas that are purified.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as having the nature of being afflicted or having the nature of being purified.

original: gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig kun tu rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang; 'du byed ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig kun tu rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig kun tu rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang; 'du byed ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig kun tu rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see form as moving about together with feeling.🔽He does not see feeling, perception, or volitional factors as moving about together with consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed dang lhan cig kun tu rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed dang lhan cig kun tu rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: He does not see consciousness as moving about together with volitional factors.

original: de ni 'di ltar chos gang yang chos gang dang yang lhan cig kun tu rgyu ba med de /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos gang yang chos gang dang yang lhan cig kun tu rgyu ba med de /
translated: If you ask why, it is because no dharma at all moves about together with any dharma.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir 'gro ba med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir 'gro ba med do //
translated: Because of being empty of an intrinsic nature, there is no going.

original: rnam par 'gro ba med do //
analyzed: rnam par 'gro ba med do //
translated: There is no moving about.

original: 'du ba med do //
analyzed: 'du ba med do //
translated: There is no coming together.

original: rnam par 'du ba med do //
analyzed: rnam par 'du ba med do //
translated: There is no separation.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin /🔽tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin / tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin /
translated: the emptiness of physical forms is not physical forms,🔽the emptiness of feelings is not feelings,

original: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin /
translated: the emptiness of perceptions is not perceptions,

original: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin /
translated: the emptiness of formative predispositions is not formative predispositions,

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
translated: and the emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de thogs par byed pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de thogs par byed pa med do //
translated: Thus, the emptiness of physical forms is not impeded.

original: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor par mi byed do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of feelings does not feel.

original: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes su mi byed do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes su mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of perceptions is not perception.

original: @69a *// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed do //
analyzed: @69a *// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of formative predispositions does not form.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of consciousness does not cause consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

analyzed: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /

analyzed: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te / gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid la /
translated: and form another.🔽Form is emptiness,

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //

analyzed: tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /

analyzed: tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin te / tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //

analyzed: 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /

original: 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin te /

analyzed: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //

analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Formations are not one thing,🔽and emptiness another;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /

original: 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te /🔽'du byed rnams kyang stong pa nyid la /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te / 'du byed rnams kyang stong pa nyid la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnams so //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /

original: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la /
translated: and consciousness another.🔽Consciousness is emptiness,

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes @69b pa'o //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing / kun nas nyon mongs bar 'gyur ba med / rnam par byang ba med la /

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: gang mi skye mi 'gag cing / kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med / rnam par byang ba med pa la /

analyzed: srid pa med do //

analyzed: 'gog pa mngon du bya ba med do //

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa med do //

analyzed: dgra bcom pa med do //

analyzed: rang byang chub med do //

analyzed: de la ni byang chub sems dpa' med do //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do //

analyzed: de la ni sangs rgyas med do //

original: byang chub med do //
analyzed: byang chub med do //
translated: there is no awakening,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice accordingly

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ste /
translated: are said to be diligent in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /
analyzed: de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /
translated: Although they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom in this way,

original: gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider form as either engaged or not engaged.

original: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider feeling, perception, volitional formations, or consciousness as either engaged or not engaged.

original: mig la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the eye as either engaged or not engaged.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind as either engaged or not engaged.

original: gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider form as either engaged or not engaged.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental objects as either engaged or not engaged.

original: mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid kyi khams kyi bar la brtson zhes @71a *//
analyzed: mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid kyi khams kyi bar la brtson zhes @71a *//
translated: He does not consider the eye element to be diligent or not diligent. He does not consider the form element and the eye consciousness element to be diligent or not diligent.

original: bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the mental element to be diligent or not diligent.

original: chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yar dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yar dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the mental object element and the mental consciousness element to be diligent or not diligent.

original: sa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the earth element to be diligent or not diligent.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element as either engaged or not engaged.

original: ma rig pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider ignorance as either engaged or not engaged.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len ba dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len ba dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, or old age and death as either engaged or not engaged.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the perfection of giving as either engaged or not engaged.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider whether he is endeavoring or not endeavoring in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong ba nyid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson @71b zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong ba nyid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson @71b zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider whether he is endeavoring or not endeavoring in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider whether or not they are endeavoring in the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: the limbs of awakening,🔽the path,🔽the noble truths,🔽the meditative stabilities,🔽the immeasurables,🔽the formless absorptions,🔽the eight deliverances,

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson @72a *//
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson @72a *//
translated: the nine serial absorptions,🔽emptiness,🔽signlessness,

original: zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: wishlessness,🔽and the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider whether they are endeavoring or not endeavoring with regard to all the meditative stabilities and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as having exertion or not having exertion.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see up to the knowledge of all aspects as having exertion or not having exertion.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs de lta bus na /
analyzed: rnam grangs de lta bus na /
translated: in this way

original: chos thams cad la brtson pa'am mi brtson pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad la brtson pa'am mi brtson pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: because all dharmas have no exertion or not having exertion,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings are said to be ‘exerted in the perfection of wisdom.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du mi sdud mi 'byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du mi sdud mi 'byed de /
translated: Moreover, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not include emptiness and do not exclude emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no //
translated: They do not even include the yoga of emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med par mi sdud mi 'byed de /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med par mi sdud mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not include the absence of attributes and do not exclude the absence of attributes.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no //
translated: They do not even include the yoga of the absence of attributes.

original: smon pa med pa dang / smon pa med par mi sdud mi 'byed de /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / smon pa med par mi sdud mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not include the absence of aspiration and do not exclude the absence of aspiration.

original: smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no //
translated: They do not even include the yoga of the absence of aspiration.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni 'di @72b ltar stong pa nyid la 'du ba'am 'bral ba med do //
analyzed: de ni 'di @72b ltar stong pa nyid la 'du ba'am 'bral ba med do //
translated: it is because emptiness is neither included nor excluded.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la 'du ba'am 'bral ba med do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la 'du ba'am 'bral ba med do //
translated: The absence of attributes and the absence of aspiration are neither included nor excluded.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra!

original: de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who is diligent in that way is said to be diligent in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste /
translated: they engage with the emptiness of the intrinsic identity of phenomena.

original: de de ltar khong du chud par byed pas gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de de ltar khong du chud par byed pas gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In that way, they do not combine or separate form.

original: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not combine or separate feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not combine or separate up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice like that are said to be diligent in the perfection of wisdom.🔽Śāriputra!

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: they do not join form with the past limit and do not separate it from there.

original: de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see even the past limit itself.

original: gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join form with the future limit and do not separate it from there.

original: de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see even the future limit itself.

original: gzugs dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: gzugs dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join form with the present and do not separate it from there.

original: de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang sngon gyi @73a *//
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang sngon gyi @73a *//
translated: Because they do not see even the present itself.

original: mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness with the past limit and do not separate them from there.

original: de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see even the past limit itself.🔽They do not join feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness with the future limit and do not separate them from there.🔽Because they do not see even the future limit itself.🔽They do not join feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness with the present and do not separate them from there.🔽Because they do not see even the present itself.

original: rnam par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join consciousness to the future, nor do they separate it from it.

original: de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see the future at all.

original: rnam par shes pa dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join consciousness to the present, nor do they separate it from it.

original: de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see the present at all.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join the knowledge of all aspects to the past, nor do they separate it from it.

original: de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see the past at all.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join the knowledge of all aspects to the future, nor do they separate it from it.

original: de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see the future at all.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join the knowledge of all aspects to the present, nor do they separate it from it.

original: de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because he does not see even the present as real.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who practices like this

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: is said to be endeavoring in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du stong pa nyid kyi phyir / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: because the three times are empty of any intrinsic nature of the three times,🔽they do not connect or disconnect the past with the future.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽da ltar byung ba dang sngon @73b gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // da ltar byung ba dang sngon @73b gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not connect or disconnect the future with the past.🔽They do not connect or disconnect the present with the past or the future.

original: sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not connect or disconnect the past or the future with the present.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings practicing like that are said to be endeavoring at the perfection of wisdom.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; rnam pa 'di ltar brtson par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; rnam pa 'di ltar brtson par byed de /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom endeavor in this way:

original: brtson pa des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang / mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: brtson pa des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang / mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: ‘With that endeavor I will not join or separate the knowledge of all aspects from the past’;

original: de ni 'di ltar 'das pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'das pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: because they do not see the past itself;

original: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod /

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /

translated: They do not join the element of earth, the element of water, the element of fire, the element of wind, the element of space, or the element of consciousness with omniscience, nor do they separate them.

analyzed: ma rig pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod /

analyzed: rga shi dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod /

original: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
