original: bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I will turn the wheel of the Dharma.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu byed pa med de /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu byed pa med de /
translated: It is because they do not make distinctions in the dharma-constituent.

original: de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am /
analyzed: de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am /
translated: They do not see any dharma other than the dharma-constituent that practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba'am /
analyzed: gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba'am /
translated: or any dharma that the lord buddhas should prophesy,

original: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or any dharma that will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: they do not give rise to the notion of sentient beings.

original: bdag dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: bdag dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: They do not give rise to the notions of a self, a life-force, an individual, a person, a human being, a human, an agent, an experiencer, one who knows, or one who sees.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: it is because sentient beings are utterly unborn and unceasing.

original: sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
translated: Sentient beings are not born and do not cease.

original: gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de /
analyzed: gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de /
translated: Those who are not born and do not cease

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: how could they practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med @83b pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med @83b pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices like that practices the perfection of wisdom because of the non-arising of sentient beings.

original: sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: He practices the perfection of wisdom because of the emptiness of sentient beings.

original: sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa dang / sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa dang / sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te /
translated: He practices the perfection of wisdom because of the non-apprehension of sentient beings, because of the isolation of sentient beings, because of the absence of intrinsic nature of sentient beings, and because of the lack of inherent existence of sentient beings.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste /
translated: this is the highest yoga of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas,

original: 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to //
analyzed: 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to //
translated: namely, the yoga of emptiness.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te /
translated: this is the yoga of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so //
analyzed: des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so //
translated: He will outshine all other yogis.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices this yoga

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: will accomplish the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: Śāradvatīputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices this yoga will not give rise to a miserly mind,

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: will not give rise to a mind of bad moral discipline, a mind of malice, a mind of laziness, a mind of distraction, or a mind of bad wisdom.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol @84a *//
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol @84a *//
translated: The Blessed One having said this, Śāradvatī­putra then asked him,

original: to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /
translated: where did the bodhisattva great beings who practice this yoga of the perfection of wisdom die and take rebirth here?

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur /
translated: Where will they be reborn after they die here?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
translated: you should know that the bodhisattva great beings who practice this yoga of the perfection of wisdom either died in another buddhafield and took rebirth here,

original: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o //
translated: or they died in the Heaven of Joy or among humans and took rebirth here.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni /🔽'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who has died in another buddhafield and has been reborn here

original: rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste /
translated: will quickly accomplish the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: After this life, these profound dharmas will manifest to him.

original: de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: After that, he will enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: In whatever buddhafield🔽the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas are dwelling and maintaining themselves, he will be reborn there.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will also serve those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i @84b bu; de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i @84b bu; de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra, those great bodhisattva beings who have transmigrated from the class of gods in the Heaven of Joy and have taken birth here are impeded by only one birth.

original: de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o //
translated: They do not regress from the six transcendent perfections.

original: gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do //
translated: There is nothing that is not included within the dhāraṇī gateways and the gateways of meditative stability.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas /
translated: those great bodhisattva beings who have transmigrated from the human realm

original: mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni /
analyzed: mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni /
translated: and have taken birth in a human existence

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te /
translated: are of dull faculties, except for irreversible great bodhisattva beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not quickly absorbed in the yoga of the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The doors of dhāraṇī and the doors of samādhi will not quickly manifest.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gang khyod kyis de skad du /
analyzed: gang khyod kyis de skad du /
translated: you have asked

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de /
translated: ‘When a bodhisattva great being enters into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
translated: where will he be reborn after he dies here?’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas /
translated: when a bodhisattva great being dies in this buddha realm

original: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste /
analyzed: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste /
translated: and goes to the buddha realm where the lord buddhas are present,

original: nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du /
analyzed: nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du /
translated: he will be reborn there until he fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro ////🔽@85a *// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //// @85a *// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: they will never be separated from the lord buddhas.

original: bam po lnga pa /
analyzed: bam po lnga pa /
translated: PART 5🔽THE PERFECTION OF WISDOM

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag bsam gtan bzhi po la mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag bsam gtan bzhi po la mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: there are bodhisattva great beings who are not skilled in means, who rest in the four concentrations,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de /
translated: and who also practice the six perfections.

original: de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /
analyzed: de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /
translated: Having attained the concentrations, they are reborn among the long-lived gods,

original: gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas /
analyzed: gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas /
translated: and if they obtain a human birth,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed na'ang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed na'ang /
translated: they serve the lord buddhas.

original: de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do //
analyzed: de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do //
translated: But they have dull faculties and are not sharp.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la'ang mnyam par gzhog la /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la'ang mnyam par gzhog la /
translated: there are also bodhisattva great beings who rest in the concentrations

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de /
translated: They also practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'ang yod de /
analyzed: de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'ang yod de /
translated: But because they are not skilled in means, they give up the concentrations and are reborn in the desire realm.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings are of dull faculties,

original: dbang po rno ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not of sharp faculties.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po nas /
translated: it is like this: bodhisattva great beings enter into the first concentration,

original: bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: and also into the fourth concentration,

original: byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter into loving kindness,

original: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: compassion, joy, and equanimity,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: and also into the sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes @85b med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes @85b med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: They also enter great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye /
translated: Those who possess great compassion do not take birth through the power of concentration, but through skillful means.

original: tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye /
translated: They do not take birth through the power of pure conduct,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste /
translated: nor do they take birth through the power of the formless absorptions.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do //
translated: They will be reborn in the presence of the blessed buddhas who are alive and present in the world.

original: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma bral bas /
analyzed: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma bral bas /
translated: They will not be separated from the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: In this very Fortunate Eon, they will fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: “Moreover, Śāradvatīputra, bodhisattva great beings will enter the four meditative concentrations,

original: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: and they will also enter loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: They will also enter the sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de dgra thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang @86a *//
analyzed: de dgra thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang @86a *//
translated: The skillful one thought, I will use the power of concentration, samādhi, and meditative absorption to subdue him.

original: gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /
analyzed: gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /
translated: There are also those who, through the power of their skill in the methods of the enemy, do not take birth through the power of concentration, absorption, and equipoise.

original: de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang /🔽rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am /🔽bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am /
analyzed: de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am /
translated: Even though they are born in this desire realm,🔽they are born into a great and high caste of royalty,🔽a great and high caste of brahmins,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste /
translated: or a great and high caste of householders.

original: de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi /
translated: This is not because they crave existence,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: but because they want to bring sentient beings to maturity.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: in the same way, bodhisattva great beings enter the four concentrations,

original: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: and they also enter loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: They also enter the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /
analyzed: de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /
translated: But through skillful means, they do not take birth by the power of concentration, meditative absorption, or meditative attainment.

original: de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bya'o //
translated: They are reborn with the same fortune as the gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te /
translated: They are reborn with the same fortune as the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the Yāma Heaven, the Heaven of Joy, the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, and the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations.

original: de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: They abide there and bring sentient beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They purify a buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do //
translated: They please the blessed buddhas.

original: @86b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: @86b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: “In this way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, through skillful means, enter the four concentrations.

original: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They enter loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They enter the sphere of infinite space.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de /
translated: They enter the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o //
analyzed: de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o //
translated: After they die and transmigrate from here, they are born in the world of Brahmā.

original: de dag de na'ang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag de na'ang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: There, among those beings who are Brahmās, great Brahmās, and lords with great power and control over a hundred thousand, they become the most excellent, the best, the most supreme.

original: de dag de na 'khod cing /🔽gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing dong ngo; ;de bzhin gshegs pa
analyzed: de dag de na 'khod cing / gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing dong ngo; ;de bzhin gshegs pa
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield,

original: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do //
translated: and they will request those tathāgatas, those arhats, those perfectly awakened ones to turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: there are also great bodhisattva beings who, in one lifetime,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par @87a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par @87a *//
translated: through their skill in means, become absorbed in the four meditative concentrations,

original: 'jug / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'jug / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the meditative absorption of loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness, the sense field of nothing-at-all, and the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang bsgom /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang bsgom /
translated: They also cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: They also enter the meditative absorption of emptiness, the meditative absorption of signlessness, and the meditative absorption of wishlessness.

original: de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /
translated: They are not reborn due to the power of those meditative absorptions.

original: de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing /
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing /
translated: They serve the blessed buddhas who are present,

original: de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de /
analyzed: de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de /
translated: and they practice pure conduct in their presence.

original: dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste /
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste /
translated: They are reborn in the Heaven of Joy,

original: de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas /
analyzed: de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas /
translated: and they remain there for the duration of their lives.

original: dbang po ma nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te /
analyzed: dbang po ma nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te /
translated: With unimpaired faculties, mindful and aware, they are surrounded and attended by many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of gods.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: They manifest their births here, and after manifesting unsurpassed and perfect awakening, they turn the wheel of Dharma in various buddha realms.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes ba drug @87b thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes ba drug @87b thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye /
translated: there are also bodhisattva great beings who have attained the six superknowledges and who do not take birth in the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar /
translated: They are not reborn in the realm of form or the formless realm.

original: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield, honoring, venerating, and worshipping the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the utterly perfect buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Moreover, Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /
translated: there are great bodhisattva beings who have attained the six extrasensory perceptions.

original: mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na /
translated: They play with those six extrasensory perceptions and go from buddhafield to buddhafield,

original: theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg ba'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg ba'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: where the words ‘lesser vehicle’ and ‘great vehicle’ are not even known, except for the Great Vehicle.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /
translated: there are also great bodhisattva beings who have attained the six extrasensory powers.🔽They play with those extrasensory powers

original: mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na /
translated: and go from buddhafield to buddhafield,

original: sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: where the lifespan of sentient beings is immeasurable.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /
translated: there are also great bodhisattva beings who have attained the six extrasensory powers.🔽They go from world system to world system,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi @88a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi @88a *//
translated: where the sound of the Buddha is not heard, where the sound of the Dharma is not heard, and where the sound of the Saṅgha is not heard.

original: khams su 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod /
analyzed: khams su 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod /
translated: They proclaim the excellence of the Buddha,

original: chos kyi legs pa brjod /
analyzed: chos kyi legs pa brjod /
translated: they proclaim the excellence of the Dharma,🔽and they proclaim the excellence of the Saṅgha.

original: dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod cing /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod cing /
translated: They praise the excellence of the Saṅgha.

original: sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te /
analyzed: sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te /
translated: And those sentient beings, through the sound of the Buddha, the sound of the Dharma, and the sound of the Saṅgha, become pleased.

original: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: They are reborn in places where there are blessed buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad /
translated: it is in this way that, from the time when great bodhisattva beings first begin to set their mind on enlightenment,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
translated: they are endowed with the four meditative concentrations, the four immeasurable aspirations, the four formless absorptions, the five extrasensory powers, the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions, the four supports for miraculous ability,

original: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: the five powers, the five strengths, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas /
translated: great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye /
analyzed: de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye /
translated: and they are never born in the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing /
translated: They are not born in the form realm or the formless realm,

analyzed: de dag tu'ang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do //
translated: and they benefit sentient beings there.

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
