original: mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: They will not experience poverty and destitution.

original: lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: They will not take on a body that is despised by the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas /
translated: endowed with such wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags /
translated: “Blessed One, what is that omniscient wisdom by which bodhisattva great beings never take birth in the lower realms, never experience human poverty and destitution, and never take on a body that is despised by gods, humans, and demigods?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems @97a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems @97a *//
translated: bodhisattva great beings

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni /
translated: who possess such wisdom

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //
translated: will see as many thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges in as many world systems in the eastern direction as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges.

original: chos kyang nyan to //
analyzed: chos kyang nyan to //
translated: They will also hear the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
translated: and the bodhisattva saṅgha, and the array of the qualities of the buddha realm.

original: lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo //
analyzed: lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo //
translated: In the southern, western, northern, northeastern, southeastern, southwestern, and northwestern directions, below and above, in each direction in world systems numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, he sees tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: chos kyang nyan to //
analyzed: chos kyang nyan to //
translated: He hears the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
translated: He sees the bodhisattva saṅgha and the array of the qualities of the buddha realm.

original: ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do //
analyzed: ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who has that kind of wisdom does not produce the notion of a buddha.

original: chos kyi 'du shes dang / dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'du shes dang / dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do //
translated: they do not arouse the idea of the Dharma,🔽they do not arouse the idea of the Saṅgha,🔽they do not arouse the idea of the śrāvakas,🔽they do not arouse the idea of the pratyekabuddhas,🔽they do not arouse the idea of the bodhisattvas,🔽they do not arouse the idea of the buddhas,

original: nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do; ;bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do; ;bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do //
translated: they do not arouse the idea of self,

original: gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do //
translated: they do not arouse the idea of other,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do //
translated: and they do not arouse the idea of a buddhafield.

original: ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni @97b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni @97b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings who have that kind of wisdom practice the perfection of generosity,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: They practice the perfection of moral discipline,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the perfection of moral discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: They practice the perfection of patience,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: They practice the perfection of perseverance,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do /
translated: They practice the perfection of concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽They cultivate the emptiness of external phenomena,🔽the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness,🔽the emptiness of great extent,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all things,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of non-entities,🔽and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: They cultivate the four noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom @98a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom @98a *//
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances.

original: ste; mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ste; mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: they do not apprehend the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They cultivate the level of the śrāvakas, the level of the pratyekabuddhas, the level of the genuinely perfect buddhas, and the level of the pratyekabuddhas, and they cultivate the level of the śrāvakas, but they do not apprehend the level of the śrāvakas.🔽They cultivate the level of the pratyekabuddhas, and they cultivate the level of the pratyekabuddhas, but they do not apprehend the level of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽They cultivate the level of the genuinely perfect buddhas, and they cultivate the level of the genuinely perfect buddhas, but they do not apprehend the level of the genuinely perfect buddhas.🔽They cultivate the level of the śrāvakas, the level of the pratyekabuddhas, and the level of the genuinely perfect buddhas, but they do not apprehend the level of the śrāvakas, the level of the pratyekabuddhas, or the level of the genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom ste /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: but they do not apprehend the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te /
translated: This is the knowledge of bodhisattva great beings.

original: ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who possesses that wisdom will also perfect all the buddhadharmas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He will also not see all the buddhadharmas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in the same vein, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod do //
analyzed: mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod do //
translated: they attain and refine the five eyes.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

analyzed: gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba /

analyzed: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The five faculties of this person will arise through the emptiness gate of liberation.

analyzed: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the samādhi of the immediately preceding, the vision of the wisdom of liberation will arise.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas /

analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs snyoms pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te /
translated: He abandons the three fetters: the view of the transitory composite, doubt, and holding the view that the performance of rules and rituals is essential.

original: gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This person is called a stream-enterer.

original: des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas /
analyzed: des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas /

analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab rab tu srabs par byed de /
translated: he weakens attachment to the desire realm and hostility.

analyzed: gang zag 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //

original: de lam de nyid bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de lam de nyid bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas /

analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de /

original: gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: This person is called a non-returner.

original: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas /
analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas /
translated: Having cultivated that path even more,

original: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig @100b pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig @100b pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste /

analyzed: gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o //

analyzed: gang zag 'di ni mtshon ma med pa la gnas pa ste /

translated: the knowledge-vision of liberation will arise.

analyzed: gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o //

translated: Through the five faculties, he will attain the concentration of the immediate.🔽Through the concentration of the immediate,

analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
