analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the purity of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s Dharma eye.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no //
translated: furthermore, whatever arises is all subject to cessation.

original: zhes bya bar shes pas /
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes pas /
translated: Knowing this,

original: dbang po lnga thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbang po lnga thob par 'gyur te /
translated: he attains the five powers.

original: 'di ni / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: 'di ni / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the purity of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s Dharma eye.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems @101a *//
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems @101a *//
translated: Śāriputra,

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste /
translated: furthermore, with the Dharma eye, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva knows that this bodhisattva-mahāsattva has generated the first thought of awakening,🔽and so on up to:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: He practices the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patient acceptance, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te /
analyzed: de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te /
translated: Through that he is endowed with the faculty of faith and the faculty of perseverance.

original: thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin to //🔽dge ba'i rtsa bas bsten pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin to // dge ba'i rtsa bas bsten pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: Through skillful means he deliberately takes on a body.🔽Because he is supported by wholesome roots, this bodhisattva great being is born into a great and lofty family of brahmins,

original: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: a great and lofty family of householders,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: among the Cāturmahā­rājika gods,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: among the Trāyastriṃśa gods,

original: mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o // dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: He will be reborn among the Tuṣita gods.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: He will be reborn among the Nirmāṇarati gods.

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: He will be reborn among the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods.

original: de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: Dwelling there, he will bring beings to maturity.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will serve them with all the necessities of happiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He will purify the buddhafields.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will serve the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly awakened ones.

original: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti @101b stang dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti @101b stang dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will serve them, honor them, make offerings to them, praise them, and revere them.

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
translated: He will not fall into the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: “This bodhisattva mahāsattva will not turn back until he has attained the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the purity of the bodhisattva great beings’ eye of Dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: furthermore, the bodhisattva great beings

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
translated: know, ‘This bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o //
translated: has been prophesied to attain unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o //🔽'di ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o // 'di ni nges pa'o //
translated: This one has not.🔽This one is definite.

original: 'di ni ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ma nges pa'o //
translated: This one is indefinite.

original: 'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: This one will receive a prophecy.

original: 'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This one will not.

original: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste dbang thob pa'o //
translated: These are irreversible, having attained mastery.’

original: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste dbang ma thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste dbang ma thob pa'o //
translated: These are not irreversible, because they have not attained the tolerance of the non-arising of things.

original: 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: This one has perfected the superknowledges.

original: 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
translated: This one has not perfected the superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
translated: This bodhisattva great being has perfected the superknowledges and has gone to the world systems of the eastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do //
translated: and has pleased the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly Awakened Ones,

original: rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed do //
translated: and has served them, honored them, revered them, and made offerings to them.

original: lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang @102a *//
analyzed: lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang @102a *//
translated: In the southern, western, and northern directions, and in the directions of the nadir and the zenith,

original: shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
analyzed: shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
translated: in the eastern direction, in the southern direction, in the western direction, in the northern direction, in the northeastern direction, in the southeastern direction, in the southwestern direction, in the northwestern direction, below and above, in each single world system in the ten directions, in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, they approach the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly awakened buddhas, and they please those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas by means of the service and respect.🔽They make offerings to them,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do //
translated: and they make offerings to those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas with flowers, with incense, with perfume, with garlands, with ointments, with powders, with cloth, with parasols, with flags, and with banners.🔽They make offerings to them with music and song.🔽They make offerings to them with the five divine pleasures.🔽They make offerings to them with the seven precious substances.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.

original: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed de /🔽'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed de / 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.

original: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro // 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o //
translated: They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.

original: 'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no //🔽'di ni dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no // 'di ni dbang thob pa'o //
translated: They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.

original: 'di ni dbang thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dbang thob pa ma yin no //
translated: They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical instruments.🔽They make offerings to them with the sound of the five musical

original: 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro; ;byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro; ;byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This one will not purify a Buddha-field.

original: 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: This one has great vows.🔽This one does not have great vows.🔽This one has matured beings.

original: 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so; ;'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so; ;'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so //
translated: This one has not matured beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: This Bodhisattva, this great being, in world systems in the ten directions,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: as many as the sands of the Ganges river, is praised by the Blessed Buddhas.

original: 'di la ni legs par brjod pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: 'di la ni legs par brjod pa mi mdzad do //
translated: This one is not praised.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas @102b bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas @102b bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: These Bodhisattvas, these great beings, will stand in the presence of the Blessed Buddhas.

original: 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: These will not stand in their presence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva, having attained enlightenment, will have an immeasurable lifespan.

original: 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The lifespan of this one will be limited.

original: 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The light, voice, and bhikṣu saṅgha of this one will be immeasurable.

original: 'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will have a limited [lifespan].

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: will have a saṅgha of bodhisattvas.

original: 'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will not have one.

original: 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will practice austerities.

original: 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will not practice them.

original: 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o //
translated: This one is in their final existence.

original: 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no //
translated: This one is not in their final existence.

original: 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will sit at the seat of enlightenment.

original: 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will not sit there.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: “These bodhisattva great beings have Māra.

original: 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: These bodhisattva great beings do not have Māra.”

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that way,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
translated: the eye of Dharma of the bodhisattva great beings is purified.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra then asked, “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
translated: what is the eye of the buddhas of the bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,🔽the bodhisattva great beings,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi @103a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi @103a *//
translated: after the thought of awakening,

original: rjes la / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
analyzed: rjes la / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
translated: having settled into the vajra-like meditative stabilization,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
translated: attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: He is endowed with the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, great compassion,

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: great joy, and great equanimity, and is endowed with the unobscured liberation of a buddha’s attributes.

original: de ni de'i mig ste /
analyzed: de ni de'i mig ste /
translated: That is his eye.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de dang ldan pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de dang ldan pas /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who has that eye

original: rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am /
translated: does not see anything at all that is not seen,

original: ma thos pa'am /🔽ma shes pa'am /
analyzed: ma thos pa'am / ma shes pa'am /
translated: does not hear anything at all that is not heard,

original: khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de /
analyzed: khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de /
translated: does not know anything at all that is not known,🔽and does not comprehend anything at all that is not comprehended.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is the pure eye of the Buddha of a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained manifestly perfect buddhahood with regard to all things.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su spyang bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su spyang bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas /
translated: if bodhisattva-mahāsattvas wish to refine and attain these five eyes,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
translated: they should strive in the six transcendent perfections.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: why is this?

original: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
translated: It is because all wholesome dharmas are included in the six transcendent perfections,🔽and all the dharmas of the śrāvakas, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, the dharmas of the bodhisattvas, and all the dharmas of the buddhas are included in them.

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med @103b do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med @103b do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'das par brjod pa zhig tu dgos na /
analyzed: la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'das par brjod pa zhig tu dgos na /
translated: Some say that the perfection of wisdom is the one that speaks of all wholesome dharmas as past.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the one that speaks of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / mig lnga po 'di dag skyed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / mig lnga po 'di dag skyed pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is the one that produces all the perfections and the five eyes.

original: mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who train in those five eyes

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice this perfection of wisdom

original: mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste /
translated: attain the perfection of supernormal knowledge.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do //
translated: He experiences many kinds of magical transformations.

original: de ni sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g-yo bar byed do //🔽gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g-yo bar byed do // gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro //
translated: He causes this great earth to quake.🔽He becomes one and then many.

original: mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: He becomes many and then one.

original: snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do //
analyzed: snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do //
translated: He experiences being visible and invisible.

original: rtsig pa las thal ba dang rab las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste /
analyzed: rtsig pa las thal ba dang rab las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste /
translated: He travels through walls, through ramparts, through mountains, through enclosures—through the body he travels unimpeded,

original: dper na / nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: just as through space.

original: nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste /
translated: He travels cross-legged through the sky,

original: dper na / 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
translated: just as a bird does through the air.

original: sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de /🔽dper na / chu la bya ba bzhin no //🔽chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste /
analyzed: sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de / dper na / chu la bya ba bzhin no // chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste /
translated: He dives in and out of the earth as if it were water.

original: dper na / sa la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / sa la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: He walks on water without sinking as if it were dry land.

original: du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te /
analyzed: du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te /
translated: He emits smoke and flames from his body,🔽just as from a great bonfire.

original: @104a *// dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no //
analyzed: @104a *// dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no //
translated: like a great mass of fire.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la /
translated: “The sun and moon are so powerful,🔽so mighty,

original: 'di ltar mthu che zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar mthu che zhing /
translated: so majestic,

original: 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing /
translated: that they can touch with their hands

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar lus kyis dbang sgyur te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar lus kyis dbang sgyur te /
translated: and control with their bodies up to the Brahma world.

original: rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: But they do not become proud because of their magical power.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because they are empty of inherent nature,

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: isolated from inherent nature, and not born from inherent nature.

original: des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te /🔽de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: They do not apprehend any magical power on account of which they might become proud.

original: rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: Except for keeping in mind the knowledge of all aspects, they do not even give rise to the thought of magical power or the accomplishment of magical power.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: In this way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge that manifests many kinds of miracles.

original: de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
analyzed: de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
translated: “With their divine ear, which is pure and surpasses human hearing,

original: lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te /
analyzed: lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te /
translated: they hear both divine and human sounds.

original: lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: With that divine ear, they do not think, ‘I am listening to sounds.’

original: de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are empty of a basic nature, isolated in their basic nature, and unborn in their basic nature,

original: rna ba dang sgra dmigs pa med de /
analyzed: rna ba dang sgra dmigs pa med de /
translated: the ear and sound are not apprehended.

original: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams @104b la bsam pa yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams @104b la bsam pa yang mi skyed do //
translated: Except for keeping in mind omniscience, they do not even think of the divine ear.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: In this way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the supernormal knowledge that manifests the divine ear.🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in a Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po drug pa /
analyzed: bam po drug pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: des sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: des sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With their minds they know exactly the minds of other beings and other individuals.

original: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la /
translated: In a mind with desire,

original: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: they know exactly that it is a mind with desire.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la /
translated: In a mind without desire,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: they know exactly that it is a mind without desire.

original: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a mind that is full of hatred as a mind that is full of hatred.🔽He knows a mind that is free from hatred as a mind that is free from hatred.

original: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a mind that is full of ignorance as a mind that is full of ignorance.

original: gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a mind that is free from ignorance as a mind that is free from ignorance.

original: sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽sred pa dang @105a *//
analyzed: sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽sred pa dang @105a *//
translated: He knows a mind that is full of craving as a mind that is full of craving.🔽He knows a mind that is free from craving as a mind that is free from craving.

original: bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind without anger as a mind without anger.🔽He knows as it really is a mind with ignorance as a mind with ignorance.🔽He knows as it really is a mind without ignorance as a mind without ignorance.

original: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a contracted mind as a contracted mind.🔽He knows as it really is a distracted mind as a distracted mind.🔽He knows as it really is an exalted mind as an exalted mind.

original: nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is an unexalted mind as an unexalted mind.🔽He knows as it really is a surpassed mind as a surpassed mind.🔽He knows as it really is an unsurpassed mind as an unsurpassed mind.🔽He knows as it really is a concentrated mind as a concentrated mind.🔽He knows as it really is an unconcentrated mind as an unconcentrated mind.🔽He knows as it really is a liberated mind as a liberated mind.

original: rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is an unliberated mind as an unliberated mind.🔽“He knows as it really is: ‘This is the path, this is not the path.’🔽He knows as it really is: ‘This is the practice, this is not the practice.’🔽He knows as it really is: ‘This is the defilement, this is the purification.’🔽He knows as it really is: ‘This is the arising, this is the passing away.’🔽He knows as it really is: ‘This is the gratification, this is the danger, this is the escape.’🔽“He becomes one who has attained the various kinds of supernormal knowledge, who has mastered the various kinds of supernormal knowledge.🔽Having been one, he becomes many; having been many, he becomes one.🔽He becomes visible; he becomes invisible.🔽He goes through walls, through enclosures, through mountains, without being obstructed as if through space.🔽He dives in and out of the earth as if in water.

original: rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He walks on water without sinking as if on land.

original: rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a vast mind as it really is as a vast mind.

original: yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows an expansive mind as it really is as an expansive mind.

original: dog pa'i sems la dog pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dog pa'i sems la dog pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a constricted mind as it really is as a constricted mind.

original: che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a great mind as it really is as a great mind.

original: tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows an immeasurable mind as it really is as an immeasurable mind.

original: mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang @105b dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang @105b dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a concentrated mind as it really is as a concentrated mind.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a distracted mind to be a distracted mind.

original: rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a liberated mind to be a liberated mind.

original: rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is an unliberated mind to be an unliberated mind.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind with āsavas to be a mind with āsavas.

original: zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind without āsavas to be a mind without āsavas.

original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows a defiled mind as a defiled mind, just as it is.🔽He knows an undefiled mind as an undefiled mind, just as it is.🔽He knows a mind with superior attitudes as a mind with superior attitudes, just as it is.

original: bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: He knows a mind without superior attitudes as a mind without superior attitudes, just as it is.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do //
translated: He does not become conceited because of that knowledge of the minds of others.

original: de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that mind is inconceivable.

original: de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
analyzed: de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
translated: He does not become conceited, thinking, ‘I know that mind.’

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / @106a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / @106a *//
translated: Because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: the isolation of inherent existence, and the non-arising of inherent existence,

original: gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am /
analyzed: gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am /
translated: he does not apprehend any thought that would be conceit.🔽Except for the thought of omniscience, he does not even give rise to the thought of knowing the thought,

original: sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: or the thought of accomplishing the knowledge of thought.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: in this way the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: accomplishes the knowledge of the superknowledge that perceives the thoughts and conduct of all sentient beings.

original: de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par bsgrub ste /
analyzed: de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par bsgrub ste /
translated: He accomplishes the knowledge of the superknowledge that perceives the recollection of past lives in many ways.

original: sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas /
analyzed: sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas /
translated: They recollect one mind,

original: sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no //
translated: up to they recollect a hundred minds.🔽They recollect one day, up to a hundred days,🔽one month, up to a hundred months,🔽one year, up to a hundred years,🔽one eon, up to a hundred eons,🔽many hundreds of eons, many thousands of eons,

original: nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang / zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
analyzed: nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang / zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
translated: many hundreds of thousands of eons,🔽many millions of eons, many tens of millions of eons,🔽many billions of eons, many tens of billions of eons,🔽many trillions of eons, and many quintillions of eons.🔽They recollect many eons of world dissolution, many eons of world evolution, and many eons of both evolution and dissolution.🔽They recollect many hundreds of eons of world dissolution, many hundreds of eons of world evolution, and many hundreds of eons of both evolution and dissolution.🔽They recollect many thousands of eons of world dissolution, many thousands of eons of world evolution, and many thousands of eons of both evolution and dissolution.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran te /🔽bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste /🔽ming ni 'di zhes bya /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran te / bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste / ming ni 'di zhes bya /
translated: They recollect many hundreds of thousands of eons of world dissolution, many hundreds of thousands of eons of world evolution, and many hundreds of thousands of eons of both evolution and dissolution.

original: rus ni 'di zhes bya /🔽rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
analyzed: rus ni 'di zhes bya / rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
translated: They recollect many millions of eons of world dissolution, many millions of eons of world evolution, and many millions of eons of both evolution and dissolution.🔽They recollect many tens of millions of eons of world dissolution, many tens of millions of eons of world evolution, and many tens of millions of eons of both evolution and dissolution.

original: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za /🔽yun ni 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug /
analyzed: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za / yun ni 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug /
translated: They recollect many billions of eons of world dissolution, many billions of eons of world evolution, and many billions of eons of both evolution and dissolution.

original: tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te /🔽de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas /
analyzed: tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te / de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas /
translated: They recollect many tens of billions of eons of world dissolution, many tens of billions of eons of world evolution, and many tens of billions of eons of both evolution and dissolution.🔽They recollect many trillions of eons of world dissolution, many trillions of eons of world evolution, and many trillions of eons of both evolution and dissolution.

original: che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas /
translated: They recollect many quintillions of eons of world dissolution, many quintillions of eons of world evolution, and many quintillions of eons of both evolution and dissolution.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir @106b skyes so zhes bya ba'i par du rnam pa dang bcas /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir @106b skyes so zhes bya ba'i par du rnam pa dang bcas /
translated: Then, after passing away from there, I was born here.’ In this way, he recollects his own and others’ past existences in their modes,

original: gtan tshigs dang bcas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang bcas /
translated: with their causes,

original: dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te /
analyzed: dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te /
translated: and with their signs.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Yet, he does not become conceited about that knowledge of the superknowledge that realizes the recollection of past existences.

original: de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te /
translated: Because that knowledge is not knowledge.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir /
translated: It is inconceivable.

original: de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
analyzed: de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
translated: He does not become conceited, thinking, ‘I know that.’🔽Because that knowledge is empty of essence,🔽is isolated by essence,

original: 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: and is unborn by essence.

original: gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend that knowledge by which he would become conceited.

original: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bab ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bab ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: Except for the thought of omniscience, he does not even give rise to the thought of the knowledge of recollecting past lives.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in this way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge of recollecting past lives.

original: de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas /
analyzed: de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas /
translated: With the pure divine eye, which surpasses the human,

original: sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te /
analyzed: sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te /
translated: they know the deaths and rebirths of sentient beings, their good and bad complexions, their good and bad destinies, and their abodes in the lower realms and the happy realms.

original: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan /
translated: They know, ‘These sentient beings have engaged in bad conduct with their bodies,

original: ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan /
analyzed: ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan /
translated: have engaged in bad conduct with their speech,

original: yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They engage in negative mental actions.

original: @107a *// 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa /
analyzed: @107a *// 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa /
translated: They disparage the noble ones.

original: log par lta ba rnams te /
analyzed: log par lta ba rnams te /
translated: They hold wrong views.

original: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o //
translated: Due to such causes and conditions, when their bodies disintegrate, they fall into the lower realms and are born in the hells.

original: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
translated: “These sentient beings engage in positive physical actions,

original: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
analyzed: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
translated: positive verbal actions,

original: yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: and positive mental actions.

original: 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa /
translated: They do not disparage the noble ones.

original: yang dag par lta ba rnams te /
analyzed: yang dag par lta ba rnams te /
translated: They hold right views.

original: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: Due to such causes and conditions, when their bodies disintegrate, they will be born in the higher realms, in the world of the gods.’

original: de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: In this way, they know that throughout the worlds in the ten directions, which are as infinite as the realm of space,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gis 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te; ;des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gis 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te; ;des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They know the births and deaths of all beings in the six destinies, throughout the reaches of space, just as they are, and yet they do not become proud on that account.

original: de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that eye is not an eye, and is inconceivable.

original: de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
analyzed: de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
translated: They do not become proud, thinking, ‘I see with that eye.’

original: de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that eye is empty of essential nature, isolated in its essential nature, and unborn in its essential nature.

original: gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te /🔽de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig bsam pa'am /
analyzed: gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te / de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig bsam pa'am /
translated: That eye is not apprehended by that eye, and so there is no pride.🔽Except for the thought of the knowledge of all things, they do not even have the thought of the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: or the thought of accomplishing the divine eye.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @107b dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @107b dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: attain the knowledge that actualizes the superknowledge of the divine eye.

original: de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub kyang /
analyzed: de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub kyang /
translated: They attain the knowledge that actualizes the superknowledge of the extinction of defilements,

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par mi byed do //
translated: but they do not attain the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see any phenomenon that could become unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de mngon par shes pa des kyang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas /
analyzed: de mngon par shes pa des kyang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas /
translated: Through that superknowledge, they attain the vajra-like meditative stabilization

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de /
translated: and completely eliminate all the afflictions that are the connections of habitual tendencies.

original: zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He does not become conceited about that higher knowledge that manifests the extinction of defilements.

original: de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that knowledge is not knowledge, and is inconceivable.

original: de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
analyzed: de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
translated: He does not become conceited, thinking, ‘I know that.’

original: de'ang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu mi dmigs so //🔽de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa'am /
analyzed: de'ang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu mi dmigs so // de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa'am /
translated: Because of the emptiness of inherent existence, the isolation of inherent existence, and the non-production of inherent existence, he does not apprehend that higher knowledge that manifests the extinction of defilements, by which he would become conceited.🔽Except for the attention to omniscience, he does not even give rise to the thought of the knowledge of the extinction of defilements,

original: zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: or to the thought of accomplishing the knowledge that manifests the extinction of defilements.

original: de ltar / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de ltar / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa'i ye @108a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa'i ye @108a *//
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledges that actualizes the exhaustion of defilements.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

original: mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni /
translated: they perfect the six superknowledges

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: and increase toward unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: they abide in the perfection of generosity🔽and

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam spyod pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam spyod pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: “There are those who, because of the emptiness of the unlimited, take up the mind of non-attachment and train in the path to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: it is in this way that great bodhisattva beings, when they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: abide in the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: and, because of the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: ltung ba bya ba med par nye bar bzung pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: ltung ba bya ba med par nye bar bzung pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: take up the absence of downfalls and train in the path to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: it is in this way that great bodhisattva beings, when they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: abide in the transcendent perfection of tolerance,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: there are those who, by taking up the unshakable, train in the path to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @108b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @108b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: they abide in the transcendent perfection of perseverance,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: and, because of the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: by taking up the perseverance of body and mind that is indestructible, they train in the path to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: they abide in the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration,

analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: “Subhūti,🔽there are also some bodhisattva great beings who, when they practice the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
