translated: nor does it exist externally,

original: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so; ;rab 'byor /
translated: nor does it abide between the two, nor is it to be apprehended anywhere else.

original: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
translated: Subhūti, the so-called form constituent is merely a designation for a dharma.

translated: nor does it abide between the two, nor is it to be apprehended anywhere else.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
translated: Subhūti, the eye consciousness element is merely a designation of a dharma.

original: chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste /
translated: That dharma designation is this:

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de /
translated: apart from the designation by way of the conventional term “eye consciousness element,” there is no arising or ceasing.

original: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
analyzed: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
translated: That name does not exist internally,

original: phyi rol na'ang med /
analyzed: phyi rol na'ang med /
translated: does not exist externally,

original: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
translated: and is not apprehended as either of the two.

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: Subhūti, the ear element, sound element, and ear consciousness element; the nose element, smell element, and nose consciousness element; the tongue element, taste element, and tongue consciousness element;

original: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi @121b khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
analyzed: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi @121b khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
translated: the element of the body, the element of tangibles, the element of the body-consciousness, the element of the mind, the element of mental objects, and the element of mind-consciousness.

original: chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste /
translated: In that designation of mental objects,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de /
translated: apart from the mere designation by terms and symbols as ‘the element of mind-consciousness,’ there is no arising or ceasing.

original: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
analyzed: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
translated: That name does not exist internally,

original: phyi rol na'ang med /
analyzed: phyi rol na'ang med /
translated: it does not exist externally,

original: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
translated: and it is not apprehended apart from both.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, this so-called perfection of wisdom, this so-called bodhisattva, and this so-called name of a bodhisattva are just designations of a mere mental object.

original: chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste /
translated: In the designation of phenomena,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya bar ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya bar ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par /
translated: except for the mere designation by way of conventions of names and symbols, such as ‘perfection of wisdom,’ ‘bodhisattva,’ and ‘name of a bodhisattva,’

original: skye ba'am 'gag pa med de /
analyzed: skye ba'am 'gag pa med de /
translated: there is no arising or ceasing.

original: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
analyzed: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
translated: That name does not exist internally,

analyzed: phyi rol na'ang med /
translated: does not exist externally,

analyzed: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
translated: and is not apprehended as either of those two.
